content: get ready to meet your new favorite crafting buddies dive into my free amigurumi pattern for these super cute chicks and duckies perfect for brightening up your space or gifting to a friend let the fluff fun begin ✨ level beginner to intermediate finished size if crocheted with a 2 5 mm hook your finished doll measure 8 cm don t forget to share your photos follow me on instagram and hashtag your creations using #ginansilyonimarya join me on instagram https //www instagram com/ginansilyo_ni_marya/ hl=en if you have questions - please contact me this pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced sold distributed or translated without authorization you can sell your finished items provided that you credit ginansilyo ni marya as the designer
